title: for loop that prints values - fix error

content.question: Which of the following changes can be made so that this code segment works as intended?

choices.label: In line 1, changing the condition j >= 0 to j > 0
In line 1, changing the initialization j = 10 to j = 9
In line 3, changing the expression j - 1 to j + 1
In line 3, changing the expression j - 1 to j - 2

content.answer: In line 1, changing the condition j >= 0 to j > 0

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
